Package spellcheck

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CheckWord
    This class is used to check whether certain words exist in a specified dictionary, which is used as a reference for correct spelling.
    CheckWordTest  
    Dictionary
    Represents a Dictionary containing many words.
    DictionaryTest  
    GreekFile
    Represents a file containing some Greek text.
    GreekFileTest  
    GreekInput
    This class is used to get input from keyboard according to a specified code page.
    GreekOutput
    This class is used to display text on the screen according to a given code page.
    Menu
    This class is used to display Menus to the user and get his choices.
    SpellCheck
    This class represents a spell-checker.
    SplitWords
    This class is used to split text into individual words.
    SplitWordsTest  
    Suggestion
    This class is used to make suggestions for incorrectly spelt words using a given dictionary as reference.
    SuggestionTest
